summary: This is an email from attorney Jack Scarola regarding a motion filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel to subpoena information from the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund. Scarola indicates an intent to file a motion to quash the subpoena and offers to discuss the matter.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Author of the email, likely representing the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund or its interests, indicating intent to file a motion to quash a subpoena from Maxwell's counsel.

events.title: Maxwell's Counsel Files Motion for Subpoena
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's counsel filed a motion seeking to subpoena information from the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Subpoena
events.description: An email was sent (likely by Jack Scarola) discussing Maxwell's motion to subpoena the Fund and the intent to file a motion to quash.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal counsel filed a motion to subpoena information from the Epstein Victim Compensation Fund.
Attorney Jack Scarola indicates an intent to file a motion to quash the subpoena on behalf of the Fund.
The information held by the Fund was provided under assurances of confidentiality.
The legal dispute involves balancing privacy concerns against the discovery process in Maxwell's criminal case.
